title: The CW
summary: The CW Television Network (commonly referred to as simply The CW) is an American English-language commercial broadcast television network that is operated by The CW Network, LLC, a limited liability joint venture[2] between the CBS Entertainment Group unit of ViacomCBS, the owner of the defunct television network UPN; and the Studios and Networks division of AT&T's WarnerMedia, the parent company of Warner Bros., former majority owner of The WB.[5] The network's name is an abbreviation derived from the first letters of the names of its two parent corporations (ViacomCBS and WarnerMedia).
